scripts.build:{{{name}}}: npm run upload -- asmpgm/{{{name}}}.asm && npm run jcl:{{{name}}}
scripts.jcl:{{{name}}}: npm run genjcl -- jcl-out-file=./lib/jcl/build_{{{name}}}.jcl assemble/{{{name}}} bind/{{{name}}} && zowe jobs submit lf "./lib/jcl/build_{{{name}}}.jcl" --directory "./output"
scripts.execute:{{{name}}}: npm run genjcl -- jcl-out-file=./lib/jcl/execute_{{{name}}}.jcl execute/{{{name}}} && zowe jobs submit lf "./lib/jcl/execute_{{{name}}}.jcl" --directory "./output"
